name: Inspector Toolbox
description: Toolbox is now a shell/launcher feature after split; calculator, todos, gallery, and forms moved into independent feature directories. 0582B hub-screen rewrite is implemented and under follow-up UX/defect polish.
constraints_summary: Code-first: each form is a Dart class (not JSON schema driven)
Shared utility layer: auto-fill and PDF export services reused by form UIs
Form-specific layout and calculations in dedicated Dart classes
Generic DB: header_data + response_data JSON columns, form_type discriminator
On-demand PDF preview (no live Syncfusion viewer)
All interactive widgets require ValueKey for dart-mcp testability
current_phase: 0582B accordion hub implemented and validated (Session 441); outstanding forms defects from Session 435 still open
